assessmentQuestionVersion.name: HRPAS_Interpersonal_Skills
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: i. Interpersonal Skills (positive attitude; ability to get along well with co-workers/clients/vendors)
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: 4 - Outstanding/Role Model 3 - Very Competent 2 - Satisfactory 1 - Inexperienced or Improvement Needed
